title: Off-Center: A Peter Johnson Omnibus
description: A collection of five previously published stories by the always-off-center Peter Johnson  A Delicate Balance: A Short Story Sparks fly when Paul meets a rather unusual woman.  The Education of Erin: A short story A short story of silly proportions about an unsatisfied woman finding sexual fulfillment in a place she least expected.  The Love Machine: A Short Story What steps would a man take to pleasure his life? What steps should he take? 'The Love Machine' is the story of just how far a husband will go to satisfy his wife when his physical abilities fail him.  Siamese Dream: A Long Short Story A young escort-for-hire gets more than she bargained for when a special set of clients takes an interest in her.  One-Armed Bandit: A Long Novelette A cheeky story about a curious woman, her best friend(?) and a one-armed man whose tastes in technology run to the erotic.
author: Peter      Johnson
